de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore

Class ScenarioInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hpi.bpt.chimera.jcore.ScenarioInstance

  • public class ScenarioInstance
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a scenario instance. The constructor looks for an scenario instance in the database or creates a new one. The constructor also initialize the fragment instances and data object instances. The scenario instance has Lists for all enabled, control flow enabled, data flow enabled, running and terminated activity instances, fragment instances and all data object instances. The scenario instance provide methods for the administration of the data object instances

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScenarioInstance

        public ScenarioInstance(int scenarioId,
                        int id)
        Creates and initializes a new scenario instance from database. Reads the information for an existing scenario instance from the database. If there is no match in the database it creates a new scenario instance.
        Parameters:
        scenarioId - This is the database id from the scenario.
        id - This is the database id from the scenario instance.

      • ScenarioInstance

        public ScenarioInstance(int scenarioId)
        Creates and initializes a new scenario instance. Also save this new instance in database.
        Parameters:
        scenarioId - This is the database id from the scenario.

      • restartFragment

        public void restartFragment(int fragmentInstanceId)
        Restarts the fragment specified by the fragment id. Removes all control nodes from the fragment from all lists and create and initializes the fragment again.
        Parameters:
        fragmentInstanceId - This is the database id from the fragment instance.

      • updateDataFlow

        public void updateDataFlow()
        Checks if the control flow enabled control nodes can set to data flow enabled.

      • checkXorGatewaysForTermination

        public void checkXorGatewaysForTermination(int controlNodeId)
        Checks if terminated control node triggers an xor gateway.
        Parameters:
        controlNodeId - id of the terminated control node which could cause a gateway to terminate

      • terminatedControlNodeInstancesContainControlNodeID

        public boolean terminatedControlNodeInstancesContainControlNodeID(int controlNodeId)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • executingGatewaysContainControlNodeID

        public boolean executingGatewaysContainControlNodeID(int controlNodeId)
        Checks if the list executingGateways contains the control node.
        Parameters:
        controlNodeId - This is the database id from the control node.
        Returns:
        true if the executingGateways contains the control node. false if not.

      • checkTerminationCondition

        public boolean checkTerminationCondition()
        Check the termination condition. Get all termination condition and prove the condition for every condition set.
        Returns:
        true if the condition is true. false if not.

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Terminates a scenario instance. Write the termination in the database and clears all lists.

      • startAutomaticControlNodes

        public void startAutomaticControlNodes()
        Starts automatic running control node instances. For example it starts the email tasks.
